title: EVERYTHING IS AWESOME!
body: Now it's in your head. HAVE A NICE DAY!

replies.body:
WHEN URE PART OF A NON LAGGY TEAM! 
EVERYTHING IS AAAWWSOME! 
when u have stable ping :P
1k ping, I shoudln't play till this issue's fixed lel, HAVE A NICE DAY PEEPS!
